name: Twitch Back (Gaspard Broussaud)
description:
Twitch Back is a singleplayer 3D game made on Unity 3D in 2018. It is a first year student project.

The Pentagone has been hacked. The president orders you to block the attack and to find the hacker. To achieve that, you are materialised into the Pentagone's computers. Will you succed ?

You play as a special force agent. In the computer, you can do actions that will be repeated after you are out of time or dead and retry the level. You will see 

The team :

- Game Design : Enzo Onesti / Alexandre Crespel / Gaspard Broussaud / Ludovic Leroux (https://ludovic-vil-coyote.itch.io/)

- Level Design : Ludovic Leroux(https://ludovic-vil-coyote.itch.io/) / Alexandre Crespel

- Programming : Gaspard Broussaud / Enzo Onesti / Antoine Guillemot

- 3D : Yann Babef / Bastien Messinese / Antoine Guillemot

- 2D : Clara Toussaint

- Sound Design : Thierry Cecchi

- Trailer/Logo  :  Arnaud Forgues(https://darmano.itch.io/) / Thierry Cecchi
